tool_description: Generates speech audio from phonetic input using neural synthesis, combining phonetic data, prosodic controls, and voice profiles to produce natural-sounding speech.

phonetic_input.description: Phonetic representation of text to synthesize

synthesis_quality.description: Synthesis quality level: low, medium, high, or ultra

error_messages: Invalid phonetic input: Phonetic representation format is not recognized.
Voice profile incompatible: The voice profile is not compatible with synthesis engine.
Invalid sample rate: Use supported sample rates (8000, 16000, 22050, 44100, 48000).
Synthesis failed: Unable to generate audio from provided inputs.
Invalid quality level: Use low, medium, high, or ultra.
usage: Provide phonetic_input, voice_profile_id, and prosodic_data. Optionally set sample_rate and synthesis_quality. Returns synthesized audio data and metadata.

synthesis_metadata.description: Technical metadata about the synthesis process
